content: I am a PhD student in Computer Vision and Cognitive Science at Ecole Normale Supérieur de Paris and INRIA. I am working on unsupervised learning of intuitive physics, under the supervision of Emmanuel Dupoux, Ivan Laptev and Josef Sivic.
summary: I am a PhD student in Computer Vision and Cognitive Science at Ecole Normale Supérieur de Paris and INRIA. I am working on unsupervised learning of intuitive physics, under the supervision of Emmanuel Dupoux, Ivan Laptev and Josef Sivic.
title: Ronan Riochet
IntPhys: A Framework and Benchmark for Visual Intuitive Physics Reasoning
